query:
UPDATE archives SET
          slug = $2,
          title = $3,
          path = $4,
          pages = $5,
          size = $6,
          thumbnail = $7,
          description = $8,
          language = $9,
          translated = $10,
          released_at = COALESCE($11, released_at),
          updated_at = NOW()
        WHERE id = $1
